```{r}
library("wrapr")

d <- data.frame(x=c(1,NA))

cname <- 'x'
rname <- paste0(cname,'_isNA')

let(
  list(CNAME=cname, RNAME=rname),
  d$RNAME <- is.na(d$CNAME)
)
print(d)
```
